6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: Al-Walid bin Al'Ayzar said:"I heard Abu 'Amr Ash-Shaibani say: 'The owner of this house - and he pointed to the house of 'Abdullah - said: I asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ): 'Which deed is most beloved to Allah, may He be exalted?' He said: 'Prayer offered on time, honoring one's parents, and Jihad in the cause of Allah

chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Prayer During Its Time
